page.title: 16LANDSCAPE OF TRIGON ESTATE/2
page.content: There is a large fish on one of the walls of the house. Part of the house is built from stone which came from the old Wareham Bridge." The original route of the river Piddle was altered into an artifically con- structed section which contains pools and a salmon ladder for salmon rearing This happened about 100 years ago. A child's description of the waterfall "When we went to Trigon Farm we went to the waterfalls. At the sides were sluice gates. The gates allow the meadows to be flooded during the sum- mer to make good pasture land. There is also a water wheel."
